How much is Remy Ma worth? $4 Million

How did Remy Ma earn her money and wealth?

Remy Ma, real name Reminisce Mackie, was born on 30 May, 1980 in New York, United States. She did not have a good childhood as she witnessed severe consequences due to her family’s drug abuse and was forced to look after her younger brothers and sister. She is married to Shamele Mackie, better known by his professional rapper name Papoose. Ma has a son Jayson, 18, from an earlier relationship and also has three step children with Papoose. As of 2018, Remy Ma’s net worth is $4 million.

Remy Ma is not only an American rapper but is also a songwriter. Her music talent was discovered by Big Pun initially and soon Pun became a mentor for her. Remy Ma made her first appearance in the music industry by appearing in singles ‘Ms. Martin’ and ‘You Was Wrong’ from the album ‘Yeeeah Baby’ by Big Pun. After Big Pun’s death, Ma was signed by rapper Fat Joe to work as a member of Big Pun’s rap group ‘Terror Squad.’

Ma is one of the four rappers to have ever reached the number one spot in the Billboard Hot 100 chart due to her outstanding contributions the single ‘Lean Back.’ She went on to release three singles, ‘Whuteva’, ‘Feels So Good’ and ‘Conceited’ from her first album titled ‘There’s Something About Remy: Based on a True Story.’ The album sold 37,000 copies in its first week and 158,000 copies in within a year.

Remy Ma was supposed to appear in a VH1 reality TV series and was busy working for her new album titled ‘PunisHER.’ However, she was arrested for her alleged involvement in a shooting in July 2017. While she was in jail, Ma married Papoose in the courtroom in 2008. Ma later appeared in the VH1 series ‘Love & Hip Hop: New York’ in the year 2015 for its season six and returned back for its season seven and eight in the year 2016 and 2017.

Ma and Fat Joe announced a joint album titled ‘Plato O Plomo’ on March 2, 2016. The first single titled ‘All the Way Up’ from the album was released the same day which earned commercial as well as critical success and was also certified platinum by the RIAA. The single also received Grammy Award nominations. Moreover, the album ranked at 44th position in the Billboard 200 chart. Ma released a diss track in February 2017 which was aimed at Nicki Minaj. The track was an instant hit and set the internet on fire.

What are the highest grossing movies of Remy Ma?

All The Way Up (2016) Feels So Good (2006) Conceited (There’s Something About Remy) (2006) My Lifestyle (2002)
